item.title: Future of Blockchain Domains
item.description: I bought this domain (splch.zil) today! I have a .dev/net domain, but I don’t like the idea of renting a space. When I discovered blockchain domain names and IPFS hosting, I knew it suited me. It all depends on security and privacy Now, I don’t know what the future holds for blockchain and IPFS internet, but I think that the importance of publicly served domains will increase by considering present privacy trends.
